reviewText: Beautifully done! I really enjoyed seeing how the children's questions got answered in terms that young viewers will understand with a delightful mix of live-action and animation. Archimedes the dragonfly has a sweet disposition and a voice that is engaging. I am really looking forward to more episodes.

This video is so professionally done, my little girl loves it.  It really engages children to learn. It is educational yet fun.  The dragonfly is the cutest little guy.  I would definately recommend this DVD.  Enjoy!!

Why Drangonfly? is a great educational video for children. While I think my daughter was a bit young (age 4) to comprehend it all she still watched it multiple times. I think it makes a great gift and hope other kids will enjoy it.
Very entertaining and educational!  Our 9 month old likes the sounds and colors and our 5 year olds are entertained and learn!  We highly recommed as a gift or for your own children.

My sons, age 7 & 3 1/2 really liked this and are looking forward to the next one when it becomes available........

Julie Z. - El Dorado Hills, CA
The Why Dragonfly? What's Up with the Moon? DVD combines fun and science for older (ages 6-10) kids.  It is interesting and eye-catching.
